hello and greetings from munich germany today

the final stop that night was the hoff boy 
house which is the most famous beer hall in

all of munich hof poi house started out as 
the royal brewery in the kingdom of bavaria

and it quickly became known for its 
bisphere you definitely come here

for the lively atmosphere where you

it is fantastic we've been here in the main

it's getting closer to midnight the atmosphere

a birthday party and a beer garden of 
course all rolled into one there's chants

there's yelling there's sometimes some breaking

just has that roar of a of a stadium like you're

you hear the roar of of the of the crowd to 
be honest sometimes you'll be like pounding

even the way i've explained it doesn't do it 
justice you have to be here to really understand

what it's like to be in a festive german beer

munich we had a great time eating our way across

of course there was only so much we could eat
